participant_1.background:
I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog.
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
my wife just left me.
I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.

participant_2.background:
I don't have much to show for myself, but my Impala is my pride and joy.
I am a memory buff who loves to learn new things and keep my mind sharp.
i am a happy person.
i love to dance.
i just lost my job and i m looking for something new.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I just got done dancing and I'm pretty sweaty.
Dancing is so much fun! I love to dance as well. What kind of dance do you do?
I do a lot of different types of dance, but my favorite is hip hop.
Hip hop is so cool! I love the energy and the style.
It's a lot of fun! What do you do for fun?
Well, I work as a waiter at a restaurant, but I also love to read and spend time with my dog, Oscar.
A waiter! That must be a lot of work. Do you like it?
It can be a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun. I love meeting new people and making their experience at the restaurant great.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at it. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but my favorite are historical fiction and mysteries.
Historical fiction and mysteries! Those are some of my favorites too!
That's awesome! I love talking to people who like the same things I do.
Me too! It's always nice to meet new people who share your interests
